OVER-LAPPING comments and then Bayta gestures at a NERDY MAN, one of the small group she on the street. He activates an odd device and SCHEMATICS THE SELDON VAULT fill the air. Not yet there isnвЂ™t. No one understands. Bayta gestures at another one of her associates. A MOUSY WOMAN positions some kind of PORTABLE PROJECTOR. Not moving a single musc The Seldon Hologram sits in the chair staring straight ah Bayta brings a small MICROPHONE to her lips, with a devio smile, and carefully enunciates.

Hello. I am Hari Seldon. The words come out in the voice of an old man. A convinci illusion. She looks triumphant. (CONTINUED)
In the middle of the MayorвЂ™s speech, the vault doors will open for the first time in six hundred years, and Hari Seldon will address the Foundation. No one knows quite what to say.

Am I?

A little over a year. Everyone is edging closer to the Hologram, hesitantly, li they expect it to move any moment. In many ways it resemb the real Hari Seldon we saw, but an idealized version of They canвЂ™t take their eyes off it. ItвЂ™s like...seeing

was taught that one man doesnвЂ™t make a difference. And not two. Not a hundred or a thousand.... You showed me different. She gently caresses his face.
